    CNSC adopts world-class earthquake notification system

    Jun 1, 2016 / collaboration, presentation

    Global earthquake notification system developed by the IAEA for Mitigation & Response In 2008, the IAEA launched the International Seismic Safety Centre (ISSC) to address how external hazards affect the safety of nuclear installations around the world.
